characters.name: Carl 'CJ' Johnson
characters.description: Carl 'CJ' Johnson is the protagonist of Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. CJ is a member of the Grove Street Families, a gang located in Los Santos. He is the younger brother of Sean 'Sweet' Johnson and Kendl Johnson, and the older brother of deceased Brian Johnson. CJ is voiced by Young Maylay.

characters.name: Tommy Vercetti
characters.description: Tommy Vercetti is the protagonist of Grand Theft Auto: Vice City. Tommy is a former member of the Forelli Crime Family and the protagonist of the game. He is voiced by Ray Liotta.

characters.name: Claude
characters.description: Claude is the protagonist of Grand Theft Auto III. Claude is a criminal who is betrayed by his girlfriend Catalina and left for dead. He is voiced by an unknown actor.

characters.name: Niko Bellic
characters.description: Niko Bellic is the protagonist of Grand Theft Auto IV. Niko is a former soldier from Eastern Europe who comes to Liberty City to escape his past. He is voiced by Michael Hollick.

characters.name: Johnny Klebitz
characters.description: Johnny Klebitz is the protagonist of Grand Theft Auto: The Lost and Damned. Johnny is a member of The Lost MC, a biker gang located in Liberty City. He is voiced by Scott Hill.

characters.name: Luis Lopez
games: GTA: The Ballad of Gay Tony
characters.description: Luis Lopez is the protagonist of Grand Theft Auto: The Ball

characters.name: Franklin Clinton
characters.description: Franklin Clinton is one of the three protagonists of Grand Theft Auto V. Franklin is a former gang member who becomes a successful car thief. He is voiced by Shawn Fonteno.

characters.name: Michael De Santa
characters.description: Michael De Santa is one of the three protagonists of Grand Theft Auto V. Michael is a retired bank robber who is living in Los Santos with his family. He is voiced by Ned Luke.

characters.name: Trevor Philips
characters.description: Trevor Philips is one of the three protagonists of Grand Theft Auto V. Trevor is a psychopath who lives in Blaine County. He is voiced by Steven Ogg.

characters.name: Ray Machowski
characters.description: Ray Machowski is a character in Grand Theft Auto III. Ray is a corrupt police officer who works for the LCPD. He is voiced by Robert Loggia.

characters.name: Ken Rosenberg
characters.description: Ken Rosenberg is a character in Grand Theft Auto: Vice City. Ken is a lawyer who works for the Forelli Crime Family. He is voiced by William Fichtner.

characters.name: Salvatore Leone
characters.description: Salvatore Leone is a character in Grand Theft Auto III. Salvatore is the Don of the Leone Crime Family. He is voiced by Frank Vincent.

characters.name: Catalina
characters.description: Catalina is a character in Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. Catalina is a criminal who is the girlfriend of Carl 'CJ' Johnson. She is voiced by Cynthia Farrell.

characters.name: Dwayne Forge
characters.description: Dwayne Forge is a character in Grand Theft Auto IV. Dwayne is a former member of the North Holland Hustlers. He is voiced by Devin Richards.

characters.name: Vince
characters.description: Vince is a character in Grand Theft Auto: Vice City Stories. Vince is a member of the Vance Crime Family. He is voiced by Greg Siff.

characters.name: Misty
characters.description: Misty is a character in Grand Theft Auto III. Misty is a prostitute who works for Luigi Goterelli. She is voiced by Kim Gurney.
